name: Pierre Block de Friberg
background: Pierre Block de Friberg serves as Commissioning Editor, France 5 at France Télévisions. Focus areas: Specialist factual, science, culture. Overall network strategy emphasizes premium documentary and specialist factual content that reflects French culture, society, and perspectives with a strong emphasis on journalistic integrity, creative innovation, and cultural enrichment across its family of channels.
thematic_priorities: Science documentaries balancing intellectual rigor with accessibility
Cultural documentaries exploring French and global arts
Historical documentaries with fresh perspectives and contemporary relevance
International co-productions with strong French elements
Contemporary social issues explored through compelling narratives
Regional documentary programming celebrating French cultural diversity
target_audience: Broad French audiences across France Télévisions family of channels
budget_parameters: Documentary: €150K–€350K per hour; Specialist Factual: €180K–€400K per hour
technical_requirements: Broadcast/streaming standards; details provided upon commissioning
French and/or English; multilingual where applicable
Accessibility: Subtitles/captions; audio description per broadcaster requirements
Graphics & Branding: Adherence to broadcaster branding guidelines
current_calls: Reflect latest broadcaster priorities as outlined above; commissioner-specific interests included.
submission_process: Two-page treatment with premise, approach, and narrative structure
Details of secured or potential access
Key talent and production team credentials
additional_info: Increasing focus on distinctive voices and cross-platform reach. Emphasis on diverse voices on- and off-screen. Encouragement of sustainable production practices.
